name: Minimal Style, Solid Wood Stool, Textiles or Leather Seatings, Caning Backboard

specifications.rawSpecificationsHTML: The Wing chair solid wood collection, flexibility, modern aesthetics, comfort and softness are the keywords for this collection. The concept is inspired by the B-52 plane design, this inspiration gave us the freedom to create a collection where the design appropriate subtle elements, harmonic transitions and thin but resistant wood thicknesses, that gave life to a unique and contemporary collection. Our studio objective was to abstract most of the figurative elements and arrive in the very sweet spot in this design, the “cream”, driving the details in a three dimensional way. All our objects are drawn using the Da Vinci's "golden section", and the wing collection is not an exception, this assures pleasing proportions and contrast between each design part that composes the object in a deep study in the thicknesses and the relationship between each component sizing. The Wing chairs and stools are crafted with passion using premium materials and the latest technologies in furniture manufacturing, with a very precise quality control, on its beauty there is the subtle variations between the wood veins in a real living item without ethnic appeal yet been warm resulting in well-rounded comfortable pieces, delicate in design and sturdy in construction. All this qualities converge in and merge in a collection made to participate in the life of our clients as a breeze, comfortably, pleasant, harmonic and positive. We offer a caning back solution and a solid back option, stools and chairs versions. There are three solid wood tonalities as standard and a solid Ebonized black, we also offer wood harmonization if needed, so we work the tonality to approximate a particular target. All woods and materials are certified and responsibly sourced and manufactured. Listing features the black ebonized solid wood stool with natural distress leather 20363, natural caning back. This piece seat height may be customized for your needs of counter height or bar height. The stool seating height is customizable in up to 29in (74cm) or bellow. *Our pieces are made with passion and attention to quality, comfort, and design, which are our priorities for daily users. We use ultra-premium materials that are carefully crafted through manual processes and solid wood sculpting. Please consider a tolerance of up to 2 inches in the dimensions, plus or minus. The seat height may impact the overall dimensions within this range, as we adjust from below.
specifications.rawSpecificationsText:
The Wing chair solid wood collection, flexibility, modern aesthetics, comfort and softness are the keywords for this collection. The concept is inspired by the B-52 plane design, this inspiration gave us the freedom to create a collection where the design appropriate subtle elements, harmonic transitions and thin but resistant wood thicknesses, that gave life to a unique and contemporary collection. 

Our studio objective was to abstract most of the figurative elements and arrive in the very sweet spot in this design, the “cream”, driving the details in a three dimensional way. All our objects are drawn using the Da Vinci's "golden section", and the wing collection is not an exception, this assures pleasing proportions and contrast between each design part that composes the object in a deep study in the thicknesses and the relationship between each component sizing. 

The Wing chairs and stools are crafted with passion using premium materials and the latest technologies in furniture manufacturing, with a very precise quality control, on its beauty there is the subtle variations between the wood veins in a real living item without ethnic appeal yet been warm resulting in well-rounded comfortable pieces, delicate in design and sturdy in construction. 

All this qualities converge in and merge in a collection made to participate in the life of our clients as a breeze, comfortably, pleasant, harmonic and positive.

We offer a caning back solution and a solid back option, stools and chairs versions. There are three solid wood tonalities as standard and a solid Ebonized black, we also offer wood harmonization if needed, so we work the tonality to approximate a particular target. All woods and materials are certified and responsibly sourced and manufactured. 

Listing features the black ebonized solid wood stool with natural distress leather 20363, natural caning back. 

This piece seat height may be customized for your needs of counter height or bar height.  The stool seating height is customizable in up to 29in (74cm) or bellow.

*Our pieces are made with passion and attention to quality, comfort, and design, which are our priorities for daily users. We use ultra-premium materials that are carefully crafted through manual processes and solid wood sculpting. Please consider a tolerance of up to 2 inches in the dimensions, plus or minus. The seat height may impact the overall dimensions within this range, as we adjust from below.
